results.title: Fix dispatch_workflow to use PR branch ref instead of merge ref
results.author: Copilot
results.impact_rationale: Critical bug fix for dispatch_workflow functionality in PR contexts. Prevents workflow dispatch failures when triggered from PRs. High impact - blocks PR-based workflow automation.
results.urgency_rationale: Very recent PR (< 1 hour old). Fixes workflow dispatch in PR contexts but not yet ready (draft). Age penalty: 0 hours. Low urgency due to draft status.
results.quality_rationale: Draft status with pending CI. Good description and comprehensive test coverage (3 test cases). Touches security-sensitive dispatch code. Needs CI validation and review.
results.action_explanation: Draft PR with high risk due to dispatch workflow changes. Defer until marked ready for review and CI passes. Well-tested but needs validation.

results.title: Fix firewall SSL-bump field extraction in frontmatter parser
results.author: Copilot
results.impact_rationale: Fixes critical bug blocking documented firewall HTTPS inspection feature (ssl-bump, allow-urls). Users cannot configure SSL inspection. High impact - blocks documented feature usage.
results.urgency_rationale: Fixes issue #13908. Blocks documented security feature. Age: 16.8 hours. Already triaged with high priority. Urgency boosted by bug fix status (+10).
results.quality_rationale: Excellent description with code examples. 8 unit tests + integration test. Not draft but CI pending. Well-documented fix with comprehensive tests. Fixes known issue.
results.action_explanation: Critical bug fix for documented security feature. Excellent test coverage and documentation. Fast-track once CI passes despite high risk (security-sensitive firewall code).
